testsuite.name: users.UsersMobileNumberFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Mobile Number field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Mobile Number* text is displayed in the Mobile Number placeholder TC_usersMobileNoPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Mobile Number field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen Mobile Number field Entered text ".%/_[[+]" in the Users screen Mobile Number field Special characters are not allowed in the Mobile Number text field TC_usersMobileNoSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Mobile Number in the Users Add screen" Required error message is displayed TC_usersMobileNoEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Mobile Number field for the minimum length" Performed click action on Users screen Mobile Number field Entered text "9775977" in the Users screen Mobile Number field Must be greater than 7 digits error message is displayed TC_usersMobileNoMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoAlpha Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Mobile Number field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen Mobile Number field Entered text "bplAlBLZ" in the Users screen Mobile Number field Alpha characters are not accepted in the Mobile Number text field TC_usersMobileNoAlpha Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Mobile Number field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Mobile Number text field Only numbers are allowed error message is displayed TC_usersMobileNoSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersMobileNoMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Mobile Number field for the maximum length" Entered text "5589277794396" in the Users screen Mobile Number field Must not exceed 12 digits error message is displayed TC_usersMobileNoMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed
